Welcome to the Video Game Completion Companion, v 0.2.
This app is designed for those of us that want to be able to compile a complete list of video games that they have completed over their time.
As the app progresses, extra features are planned. These include: -A wishlist tracking games that you wish to play -A backlog that includes games that you own, but have not played or want to play more of -Extensive library of games to automatically search through in addition to manual input
This app is also in beta: expect a few bugs and rough ends.
